name: krbtgt
description: user of Kerberos authentication protocol in windows Active Directory (AD) environment

name: Tenable Nessus
description: Nessus is the most trusted vulnerability scanning platform for auditors and security analysts by Tenable Network Security, Inc.

name: Adobe Acrobat Reader
description: Adobe Acrobat Reader DC software is the free global standard for reliably viewing, printing, and commenting on PDF documents

name: VMware Tools
description: VMware Tools is a suite of utilities that enhances the performance of the virtual machines guest operating system and improves management of the virtual machine. Without VMware Tools installed in your guest operating system, guest performance lacks important functionality

name: PuTTY
description: PuTTY is a free and open-source terminal emulator, serial console and network file transfer application. It supports several network protocols, including SCP, SSH, Telnet, rlogin, and raw socket connection. It can also connect to a serial port

name: NMSecurity
description: NM Security Works (NMSW) is a professional security systems installer and consulting company

name: Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable
description: The Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable Package (x86) installs runtime components of Visual C++ Libraries required to run applications developed with Visual C++ on a computer that does not have Visual C++ installed.

name: Microsoft Visual C++ Minimum Runtime
description: Microsoft Visual C++ Minimum runtime contains components of Visual C++ Libraries required to run applications developed with Visual C++ on a computer that does not have Visual C++ installed.

name: Desktop Experience
description: Desktop Experience includes features of Windows 8, such as Windows Media Player, desktop themes, and photo management. Desktop Experience does not enable any of the Windows 8 features

name: Simple TCP/IP Services
description: Simple TCP/IP Services supports the following TCP/IP services: Character Generator, Daytime, Discard, Echo and Quote of the Day. Simple TCP/IP Services is provided for backward compatibility and should not be installed unless it is required.

name: Microsoft .NET Framework SDK
description: The Microsoft® .NET Framework Software Development Kit (SDK) version 1.1 includes everything developers need to write, build, test, and deploy .NET Framework applications—documentation, samples, and command-line tools and compilers.

name: WinSCP
description: WinSCP is a free and open-source SFTP, FTP, WebDAV and SCP client for Microsoft Windows. Its main function is secure file transfer between a local and a remote computer.

name: Web Server (IIS)
description: Web Server (IIS) provides a reliable, manageable, and scalable Web application infrastructure.

name: Oracle Database
description: Oracle Database is a multi-model database management system produced and marketed by Oracle Corporation.
